title: Journey - Live In Houston 1981 - The Escape Tour
description: Journey concert in Houston Texas in November 1981, part of their tour promoting their album "Escape". This concert, about 76 minutes long, was originally televised on MTV. In 2017, some American public television stations have broadcasted it. Song order / Chapters in the large mkv file: 01. Escape 02. Line Of Fire 03. Lights 04. Stay Awhile 05. Open Arms 06. Mother, Father 07. Jonathan Cain piano solo 08. Who's Cryin' Now 09. Where Were You 10. Steve Smith drum solo 11. Dead Or Alive 12. Don't Stop Believin' 13. Stone In Love 14. Keep On Runnin' 15. Neal Schon guitar solo 16. Wheel In The Sky 17. Lovin', Touchin', Squeezin' 18. Anyway You Want It See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Live_in_Houston_1981:_The_Escape_Tour ------ Video: AVC, [email protected]; 2366 Kbps,720x552; 25 fps Audio: AAC, HE-AAC / LC; 256 Kbps; 6 channels; 48.0 KHz ------- Note that there is an older torrent of this concert, with size 1.05 G, which still has a few seeders. It can be found at with the title "Journey Live In Houston (1981)". That torrent has each song as a separate .mkv file, if you prefer that. I have copied the four bonus .mkv files from that torrent and included them here, with descriptive names
